newsitem.title: USA: National R.V. to buy Country Coach.
newsitem.headline: National R.V. to buy Country Coach.

text.p: National R.V. Holdings Inc said it entered into a definitive agreement to buy Country Coach Inc, an Oregon-based motor coach manufacturer.
Terms of the acquisition were not disclosed, although National R.V. said it expects the acquisition to be accretive to earnings.
It said Country Coach had sales of about $70 million in 1995 and pretax earnings of about $2.8 million.
National R.V., which makes motor homes, said the purchase of Country Coach will enable it to offer a complete line of products at prices ranging from $40,000 to $700,000.
